PREFIX: used to address certain relatives or friends to convey sentiment of intimacy
阿拉伯文 Ālābówén: n the Arabic language (especially the writing)
NOTES_1: 阿姨āyí is a form of address used by a child for a woman about his/her mother's age.
NOTES_2: 阿姨 āyi is also used by adults and children for domestic helpers and female nursery staff.
啊ā: I INTERJ (used to express strong emotions such as surprise, admiration, regret etc.) oh, ah
PARTICLE: attached to a sentence to express strong emotions such as surprise, admiration, regret etc.
哎āi: INTERJ (used to attract attention or express surprise)

哎呀 āiyā INTERJ: used to express surprise or annoyance
哎呀,我说了半天,你怎么还不明白?Āiyā, wǒ shuōle bàntiān: Goodness, I've been explaining for ages, how come you still don't see the point?
哎哟 āiyō INTERJ: used to express surprise or pain
Alas, the child is sick again.
哀āi: l v mourn II ADJ grieved
挨ái: v undergo (some painful or unpleasant experience)
蔼ǎi TRAD: 藹 ADJ amiable, friendly (See 和蔼 hé’ai)
矮ǎi: ADJ (of a person or plant) of short stature, short
他虽然长得矮,但是篮球打得挺好。Tā suīrán zhăng de ăi, d: Although he's short, he's a good basketball player.
爱ài TRAD: 愛 v 1 love 2 like, be fond of
爱好 àihào: I v like, be interested in, have as a hobby || n hobby, interest

yóuxì: I have many hobbies, but my favorite is playing computer games.
爱护 àihù: v care for and protect, cherish父母都爱护自己的孩子。
Fùmŭ dōu àihù zìjì de háizi: All parents care for and protect their children.
爱面子 ài miànzi: v be overly concerned about one's image
爱情 àiqíng: N romantic love 年轻人都希望获得爱情。Niánqīngrén dōu xīwàng huòdé àiqíng. Young people all yearn for love.
NOTE: 爱人 àirén as husband or wife is only used in Mainland China as a colloquialism. On formal occasions 丈夫 zhàngfu (husband) and 妻子 qīzi (wife) are used instead. Now there is a decreasing tendency to use 爱人 àirén in China. In its place 先生 xiānsheng and 太太 tàitai are used to refer to husband and wife, a long established practice in Taiwan, Hong Kong and overseas Chinese communities.
NOTE_AIDS: 艾滋病 is a transliteration, i.e. reproducing the sounds of the English word AIDS.

安全帽ānquánmào: safety helmet II ADJ safe, secure
安置ānzhì: v find an appropriate place (for people)

安装空调设备: ānzhuāng kōngtiáo shèbei install an air-conditioner
岸: àn n bank or shore (of a river, lake, or sea) 河的两岸是一个
按: àn PREP according to, in accordance with 我一定按你说的
按时: ànshí ADV according to a fixed time, on time你得按时吃药,
按照: ànzhào PREP according to, in accordance with (same as 按àn)
暗: àn ADJ dark, dim房间里太暗了,你要看书得开灯。Fángjiān li
暗暗得意: àn’àn déyì secretly very pleased with oneself
光线暗淡的房间: guāngxiàn àndàn de fángjiān a dimly-lit room

八八六十四: Bā bā liùshísì. Eight times eight is sixty-four.
扒_bā_v: 1 strip off, take off (clothes, etc.) 2 hold on to, cling to
拔苗助长_bā_miáo_zhù_zhăng: pull up a young plant to help it grow (→ spoil things by excessive enthusiasm)
把1_bă_PREP: (used before a noun or pronoun to indicate it is the object of the sentence)哥哥把自行车修好了。Gēge bă zìxíngchē xiūhão le. My elder brother has fixed the bike.

handle: II M. WD 1 (for objects with handles) 2 a handful of
一把米: yì bă mă a handful of rice
把柄: băbăng N 1 handle 2 something that may be used against someone
抓住了他的把柄: zhuāzhùle tāde băbăng have got evidence that may be used against him
把握: bǎwò I n being certain and assured, confidence
你有成功的把握吗?: Nǐ yǒu chēnggōng de băwò ma? Are you sure of success?
覇: bà I n tyrant II v dominate, rule by might
霸占: bàzhàn v occupy or possess by force
霸占民房: bàzhàn mínfáng seize possession of private property by force

罢工 bàgōng: v stage a strike, down tools
游泳吧!Jīntiān tài lěng le, bié qù yóuyòng: It's too cold today. Don't go swimming, OK?
你是新加坡来的张先生吧? Nǐ shì Xīnjiāpō lái de Zhān: Aren't you Mr Zhang from Singapore?
下雪以后,路上一片白。Xiàxuě yìhòu, lù shang yí pià: The road was all white after the snowfall.
我忘了在电脑里保存文件,一个晚上的工作白做了。Wǒ wàngle zài dià: I forgot to save my document in the computer. An evening's work all came to nothing.
世界上没有白吃的午餐。Shìjiè shang méiyǒu bái chī d: There is no free lunch in the world. (→There's no such thing as a free lunch.)
NOTE: In Chinese tradition, white symbolizes death and is the color for funerals.
白酒 báijiŭ: n spirits usually distilled from sorghum or rice, white spirits
You should drink a lot of boiled water when you've got a cold.

băi: TRAD 擺 v put, place, arrange
băituō: v break away from, shake off

bàifăng_v: pay a visit (to a senior person), make a courtesy call
bài_nián_v: pay a New Year's call, wish someone a Happy New Year
bānzhăng_n: leader (of a class in school, a squad in the army, etc.)

搬家 bānjiā v move (house) 我们这个周末搬家。Women: 搬家 bānjiā v move (house) 我们这个周末搬家。Women zhège zhōumò bānjiā. We're moving house this weekend.
搬运 bānyùn v transport, move: 搬运 bānyùn v transport, move
搬运工人 bānyùn gōngrén mover: 搬运工人 bānyùn gōngrén mover
颁 bān v issue, confer on: 颁 bān v issue, confer on
颁布 bānbù v promulgate, proclaim: 颁布 bānbù v promulgate, proclaim
颁发奖状 bānfā jiăngzhuàng issue a certifica: 颁发奖状 bānfā jiăngzhuàng issue a certificate of merit
扳手 bānshǒu n spanner, wrench: 扳手 bānshǒu n spanner, wrench
第一版 dìyī băn the first edition: 第一版 dìyī băn the first edition
办 bàn TRAD 辦 v handle, manage你办事我很放心。Nĩ: 办 bàn TRAD 辦 v handle, manage你办事我很放心。Nĩ bànshì wǒ hěn fàngxīn. I feel reassured when you're handling a matter. (→ 1 have confidence in you when you're in charge.)
办法 bànfǎ N 1 way of doing things这些老办法都不行: 办法 bànfǎ N 1 way of doing things这些老办法都不行。Zhèxie lão bànfã dōu bùxíng. All these old methods won't work. 2 method
想办法 xiăng bànfǎ think up a plan, find a: 想办法 xiăng bànfǎ think up a plan, find a way of doing things
有办法 yǒu bànfǎ have a way with be resourc: 有办法 yǒu bànfǎ have a way with be resourceful
没有办法 méiyǒu bànfǎ there's nothing we can: 没有办法 méiyǒu bànfǎ there's nothing we can do 飞机票全卖完了,我们明天不能走,没有办法。Fēijī piào quán màiwán le, women míngtiān bù néng zǒu, méiyǒu bànfă. All the air tickets are sold out. We won't be able to leave tomorrow. There's nothing we can do.
办公 bàngōng v work (as a white-collar wor: 办公 bàngōng v work (as a white-collar worker, usually in an office) 王经理在办公,你有事可以给他留个话。Wáng jīnglĩ zài

definition_6: play the role (of a character in a play, movie, etc.)
example_sentence: 你能帮我找一下这本书吗? Nî néng bāng wǒ zhǎo yíxià zhè běn shū ma? Can you help me find this book?
note_1: 帮 bāng, 帮忙 bāngmáng and 帮助 bāngzhù are synonyms.
note_2: Their differences are: (1) 帮忙 bāngmáng is a verb that takes no object, while 帮 bāng and 帮助 bāngzhù are usually followed by an object.
note_3: (2) As verbs, 帮 bāng and 帮助 bāngzhù are interchangeable, but 帮 bāng is more colloquial than 帮助 bāngzhù.
note_4: (3) 帮助 bāngzhù can also be used as a noun.
example_sentence_2: 上个周末,他搬家,很多朋友来帮忙。Shàng ge zhōumò tā bānjiā, hěn duō péngyou lái bāngmáng. Last weekend, he moved house. Many friends came to help out.
note_5: NOTE: See note on 帮 bāng.
example_sentence_3: 李先生帮助我们解决了很多困难。Lĩ xiānsheng bāngzhù wǒmen jiějuéle hěn duō kùnnan. Mr Li helped us overcome many difficulties.

绑 băng TRAD: 綁 v tie, bind (with a rope)
榜样 băngyàng n:
(positive) example, role model 我们的老师是美
国人,说一口标准中文,真是我们的好榜样! Women de lǎoshī shì
Měiguórén, shuō yì kõu biāozhŭn Zhōngwén, zhēn shì wǒmen de hão
băngyàng! Our teacher is an American and speaks standard
Chinese. He really is a good role model for us.
铁棒 tiěbàng:
iron bar II ADJ strong, very good 他篮球打得真
棒。Tā lánqiú dă de zhēn bàng. He really plays basketball very well.
(→ He is a wonderful basketball player.)

包办 bāobàn: v assume full responsibility for, do entirely by oneself
包办宴席 bāobàn yànxí: (of a restaurant) take care of everything for banquets
包袱 bāofu: na bundle wrapped in a cloth-wrapper

保健: bǎojiàn n health care, health protection
妇幼保健: fùyòu băojiàn maternity and child care
保留例句: 这张飞机票我们给你保留三天。Zhè zhāng fēijīpiào wǒmen gěi nǐ băoliú sān tiān. We'll reserve this air ticket for you for three days.
保密例句: 这件事一定要保密。Zhè jiàn shì yídìng yào băomì. This matter must be kept secret.
当保姆: dāng bǎomů work as a nanny
保守例句: 你能保守一个秘密吗? Nǐ néng bǎoshòu yí ge mìmì ma? Can you keep a secret? II ADJ conservative
保守例句2: 一个人年纪大了,往往会保守。Yí ge rén niánjì dà le, wăngwăng huì bǎoshòu. As one gets old, one tends to be conservative.
保卫例句: 当外敌入侵时,每个人都应该保卫自己的国家。Dāng wài dí rùqīn shí, měi ge rén dōu yīnggāi băowèi zìji de guójiā. When an enemy invades our country, everybody should defend it.
保险: bǎoxiǎn | ADJ safe, risk-free II v insure III n insurance
保养: bǎoyăng V 1 take good care of one's health

报 bào: TRAD 報 IN newspaper (same as 报纸 bàozhì)
看报 kànbào: read a newspaper II v respond, reciprocate
报到 bàodào: v report for duty, register 学校九月一日开学,学生从
八月二十五日起报到。Xuéxiào Jiŭyuè yírì kāixué, xu: Bāyuè èrshíwù rì qì bàodào. The academic year begins on
September 1, and students start registra: September 1, and students start registration on August 25.
报道 bàodào: (or报导 bàodǎo) Iv report (news), cover 今天城里各
家报纸都报道了昨天的交通事故。Jīntiān chéng li gè jiā b: bàodàole zuótiān de jiāotōng shìgù. Today all the newspapers in the
city covered yesterday's road accident. II n news story
报恩 bào' ēn: v pay a debt of gratitude
报复 bàofù: v retaliate, revenge谁得罪了她,她一定要报复。Shéi
报告 bàogào: Iv report, make known 播音员:“现在报告新闻。”
Bōyīnyuán: “Xiànzài bàogào xīnwén.\" New: Bōyīnyuán: “Xiànzài bàogào xīnwén." Newscaster: “Now the news.”
II N report, talk (at a large-scale meet: II N report, talk (at a large-scale meeting) (份 fèn)
报刊 bàokān: N newspapers and periodicals, the press
报考 bàokǎo: v enter oneself for an examination
报名 bàomíng: v enter one's name, sign up, apply for (a place in
school) ■有六百多人报名参加星期天的长跑。You liùbăi duō: school) ■有六百多人报名参加星期天的长跑。You liùbăi duō rén

important_news_query: Jīntiān bàozhi shang yǒu shénme zhòngyào xiāoxi?
colloquial_chinese_note: 报 bào is often used instead of 报纸 bàozhi
forgot_meeting_apology: Wǒ wàngle zuótiān de huìyì, shízài bàoqiàn!
